title: PSA Dont play ranked if you have connection issues
body:
Please stop playing ranked if you are going to DC half the game. The 4 other people on your team dont care if your cat ate the router or OMG I SWEAR ITS RITO. While you might not care that you are ruining the game for your team-mates, you will end up banned by leaverbuster (The only banning mechanism on OCE)

Cheers.

replies.body: "Man my connection was super %%%% last game and I made sure to constantly tell my team mates that it lost my lane and what eventually ment the game .. But I'll just queue again immediately I'm sure it will have sorted itself out by the time I get in game again trololol"

This guy gets it.

Now I have to climb back out of silver :(
You don't get banned anymore, you just need to wait between 5 minutes to an hour before you can join a queue.
Wait you dont even get banned after repeated offences? That doesnt seem right. Just had the opponents team have a dc and it sucked for us too.
